title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Reaction to Russell Wilson & Broncos losing to Seahawks; Eagles' Darius Slay on NFL's top CBs & WRs
itunes:title: The Richard Sherman Podcast - Reaction to Russell Wilson & Broncos losing to Seahawks; Eagles' Darius Slay on NFL's top CBs & WRs
description:
You might've heard: Richard Sherman was at the Monday Night Football game between the Seattle Seahawks & Denver Broncos. Richard reacts to Russell Wilson's performance against his former team and gives his take on why Pete Carroll, Geno Smith & the Seattle Seahawks are going to be better than people think. After Richard goes off on everything from MNF, he runs through his top 5 teams in the NFL. Philadelphia Eagles corner Darius Slay joins for the second half to his Top 5 wide receivers and cornerbacks in the NFL, the Eagles' Week 1 win vs the Detroit Lions, and their Week 2 matchup vs Justin Jefferson, Kirk Cousins, and the Minnesota Vikings. Richard & Darius question why the Ravens haven't paid Lamar Jackson yet despite Lamar having proven himself as an NFL MVP. And speaking of MVP... Slay and Richard both share the same prediction for this year's winner: Los Angeles Chargers QB Justin Herbert. #volume #colincowherd #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
